forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon is marked by a radiant sun casting its glow over the city, inviting the kind of leisurely stroll that might lead one to discover a quaint café or a hidden park bench. With temperatures lingering around the comfortable mid-sixties before gently descending to the cool embrace of the evening, this day speaks of crisp air kissed by a light west wind. The skies stretch wide and blue, unmarred by fog, promising an unobstructed view of the surrounding splendor, from the iconic Golden Gate to the vibrant streets below.

As twilight approaches, the air will cool further, urging those out and about to consider a light jacket or a cozy sweater for the night ahead. It is the perfect time to indulge in some simple pleasures—perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero, savoring the last bit of daylight as the city transforms beneath the softening hues of dusk. Alternatively, one might find solace in a small gallery or an insightful bookshop, embracing the intimate ambiance that San Francisco's evenings often proffer.
